ane ammo thosa gananam mathak karanna epa......!!!pereda panthi iwarawela enagaman thosa parak dala danuth mage bada pinum gahanawa....!adath mata panthiyanna naha....me kehelmal bade amaruwa nisa.....!monawa karannada...pereda panthiya iwara wenna tikak wela giya...ithin panthiyen eliyata eddi hodatama badagini...ithin ape kastiya ekka ringuwa sayiwar kadekata...adu milata wadi poshanaya kiyala kawe thosayi uludu wadeyi...mata ewelawema danunasambaru hodi pilinuwela kiyala ( ude hadapuwada koheda ethakota welawa 1.30 withara aathi ) monawa karannada , ape kastiya kiwwa wikara nokara ooka kaladapan apita mona ajiranada kiyala....gedara aapuwama thamayi therune amaruwa ( hodawelawata gedara ) mulinma kopi biwa...ilagata
